title: 'hg change' fails while hg code-login works
body:
by **extrudedaluminiu**: 
venkatesh@meep:~/go% hg code-login
venkatesh@meep:~/go% hg pending
Changed files not in any CL:
	src/cmd/8a/lex.c
	src/cmd/8l/8.out.h
	src/cmd/8l/optab.c
venkatesh@meep:~/go% hg change
<editor>
abort: error: Connection refused
venkatesh@meep:~/go%

I'm able to login to rietveld via the web, it seems to work file there. No
particular connection troubles either.
